title: Bush Business Furniture Universal Floor Storage Cabinet with Doors and Shelves in Platinum Gray
description: The Bush Business Furniture Universal Floor Storage Cabinet with Doors and Shelves features a commercial quality design and contemporary styling that suits virtually any home or professional environment. Organize your office, breakroom, garage, laundry room or another work or living space with an accent cabinet that's built to last and boasts plenty of practical storage capacity. Cabinet doors with smooth Euro-style hinges open to reveal one fixed shelf and one adjustable shelf that accommodate office supplies, books, tools and household items of various sizes. Each shelf supports up to 50 pounds, so storing larger materials is no problem. The Floor Cabinet's base includes adjustable levelers to compensate for uneven surfaces. Contemporary finish options include Storm Gray, Platinum Gray and White with Brushed Nickel hardware. This 2 Door Storage Cabinet has been tested to meet ANSI/BIFMA quality standards for safety and performance and is backed by the Bush Business Furniture 10 Year Manufacturer's Warranty. Create your own modular storage solution by adding the Universal Floor Storage Cabinet with Drawer and Shelves, Floor Storage Cabinet with Drawers, Wall Cabinet with Doors, Tall Narrow Storage Cabinet and Tall Storage Cabinet with Doors (coordinating items sold separately).
